title: Tomato vegetable bread
ingredients: ['225ml (8 fl oz) tomato juice', '225ml (8 fl oz) water', '1 (7g) sachet fast action bread yeast', '5 tablespoons honey', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 bunch fresh parsley, chopped', '3 spring onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic', '1 carrot, grated', '1 teaspoon salt', '800g (1 3/4 lb) bread flour']
